dmca.title: [ABUSE] Cease and Desist]
dmca.body:
We are unable to locate on the web page
http://gardencenter.ixiacenter.com/gardencentercolorado/ any of the material
that you claim is being infringed as of 9:54:32 a.m. (GMT-6).
Legal Response Team
ThePlanet.com 


-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, December 13, 2005 1:14 PM
To: bradley@betterton-fikelaw.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Cease and Desist]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Cease and Desist
Date: Tue, 13 Dec 2005 11:19:43 -0700
From: Bradley Betterton-Fike <bradley@betterton-fikelaw.com>
To: <adimns@theplanet.com>
CC: abuse@theplanet.com

To Whom it May Concern:

Today we received notification that our name and other information has been
posted on http://gardencenter.ixiacenter.com/gardencentercolorado/ .  A
search of the whois directory indicates that you are responsible for the
content of this website.

Please be advised that this posting of our information was done without our
knowledge or authorization, and your unauthorized and unlawful posting of
our information subjects you and your organization(s) to significant legal
liability.

You are hereby instructed to IMMEDIATELY remove our information from your
servers and to IMMEDIATELY cease your unauthorized use of our intellectual
property.  You are further instructed to refrain from posting any of our
information on any website without our express written permission.

Unless we receive confirmation that this advertisement was deleted, we will
have no choice but to commence legal action against you to prevent your
further infringement of our intellectual property.  We expect to receive
such confirmation by the close of business today.  In the event that it
becomes necessary to commence legal action against you, we will seek, in
addition to monetary damages and attorney's fees, injunctive relief against
you, your organization, and its agents, in order to prevent further
infringements of our intellectual property.

W. Bradley Betterton-Fike
Attorney and Counselor at Law
Bradley Betterton-Fike, PLLC
469 South Cherry Street, Suite 100
Denver, CO  80246
Tel:  303-991-7400
Fax:  303-458-5180
www.betterton-fikelaw.com

THIS EMAIL MESSAGE AND ANY ATTACHMENTS THAT ACCOMPANY IT ARE FOR THE
EXCLUSIVE USE OF THE ADDRESSEE AND MAY CONTAIN CONFIDENTIAL, PRIVILEGED,
AND/OR NON-DISCLOSABLE INFORMATION.  IF YOU HAVE RECEIVED THIS MESSAGE IN
ERROR, YOU ARE INSTRUCTED TO IMMEDIATELY FORWARD THE MESSAGE BACK TO THE
SENDER AND TO DELETE ALL COPIES OF THIS MESSAGE.




- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.1 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org
